title: Strengthening Customer Service Practice Competencies: Effective Instructional Design Using Dental Lecture Recording Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Demonstrate and record standard clinical procedures with 80% accuracy using dental lecture recording equipment (smartphone/tablet/camcorder)
By the end of the six-month course, learners edit a 10-minute lecture video in MP4 format (1280x720 resolution, 30fps) compatible with LMS systems, including ≥3 cuts and ≥5 subtitles.

Over one month, learners use recorded content (CS case analysis, customer service simulations, etc.) provided ≥3 times weekly to create a personalized learning plan, record weekly execution results via checklists, and achieve 80%+ plan fulfillment rate in the monthly evaluation.
Learners can recognize copyright issues and propose appropriate solutions when creating dental education videos
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
